title: Amazon Workers Walk Out Over Layoffs and Broken Climate Promises
description: Malaise swept through the company after massive job cuts, mandatory return to the office, and surging emissions despite the company's pledge to get greener.

title: ChatGPT Is Cutting Non-English Languages Out of the AI Revolution
description: AI chatbots are less fluent in languages other than English, threatening to amplify existing bias in global commerce and innovation.

title: There Will Never Be Another Twitter
description: We talk to media scholar Ethan Zuckerman about why Twitter became the de facto digital public square and what other platforms like Bluesky or Mastodon might offer.
